entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-05-31
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Add Output Caching middleware #41955
  • Add Java client implementation for client results #41953
  • NullReferenceException in .NET MAUI Blazor when calling secured API through HttpClient after authentication #41951
  • QUESTION: Error: Connection disconnected with error 'Error: WebSocket closed with status code: 1005 (no reason given).' #41947
  • Add ValueTask overloads to EventCallBack<T> #41946
  • Skipped: ProjectTemplates tests on Windows #41937
  • JSRuntime "open" with "_blank" throws TaskCanceledException 60 seconds later #41934
    .NET 7 Planning
  • .net 7 preview 4 Using mudblazor 6.0.10 #41932
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Perf improvement: fortunes_ef, json #41931
  • [Feature Request] Remove magic strings from RazorPages routing #41930

Closed

  • Why does SignInAuthenticationHandler inherit from SignOutAuthenticationHandler? #41918
  • Can't uninstall ASP.NET 5 RC1 Update 1 #41456
  • Asp.net core source code gives compile time errors in Visual studio #41727
  • Getting started with Blazor #41808
    7.0-preview6
  • Published blazor application not able to resolve promises inside blazorwebassembly.js #41913
  • Authorized minimal APIs should be easily callable from Postman #34546
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Route constraints don't produce appropriate information in OpenAPI schema #36525
    7.0-preview6
  • Building the ASP.NET Core repository #41819
    7.0-preview6
  • SignalR Client Javascript contains dependency of eventsource which contains Critical vulnerability #41933
  • HtmlFileResult #41914
  • Blazor wasm size and load time is the worst and biggest problem ever and should be the #1 priority #41909
  • Blazor question, will navigating to same page *always* reuse the same page component #41922
  • Image from url (http) not show in Blazorwebview in wpf app #41912
  • Perf improvement: https #41905
  • Perf regression: mapaction, mvc, plaintext_netty #41906
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, single_query #41910
  • Perf regression: fortunes_actix, https, multiple_queries #41915

PullRequests

Created

  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool and runtime support (#41520) #41956
    Servicing-consider, area-web-frameworks
  • Add RouteHandlerContext.Services property #41952
    area-runtime
  • Revert "Skip failing template tests" #41950
  • Added a new doc for adding projects to the repo #41949
    area-infrastructure
  • Implemented minimal WebTransport Middleware #41945
  • Kestrel: Support full cert chain #41944
    area-runtime
  • Try test #41942
    area-runtime
  • Add missing archive files #41941
    2.1.x
  • Allow returns from all single client proxies #41939
    area-signalr
  • Update npm dev dependencies to support Node.js 18 #41938

Merged

  • Modify /problem with switch statements. #41943
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add a rule to mention the `aspnet-build` team on infrastructure issues #41940
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Add dotnet user-jwts tool and runtime support #41520
    area-commandlinetools, 7.0-preview6
  • Convert all possible `DllImport`s to `LibraryImport` for .NET 7+ #41573
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Add a new route to sample app that display OS and .NET versions #41901
    area-runtime, 7.0-preview6
  • Windows.11.Amd64.ClientPre.Open is leaving in June, switch to non-preview #41876
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Skip failing template tests #41936
    area-infrastructure, 7.0-preview6
  • Fix the RedirectHandler (in Mvc.Testing) for relative URIs #41742
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 7.0-preview6

Updated

  • [SignalR] Update some npm deps #41270
    area-signalr
  • Add redis startup error handling #41141
    area-signalr, 7.0-preview4
  • Update SDK #41798
    area-infrastructure
  • DataProtection use 6.0 app discriminator trailing slash format #41849
    area-dataprotection
  • Adding WebTransport Handshake to Kestrel #41877
    area-runtime
  • Implement Http/2 WebSockets #41558
    area-runtime
  • adds kiota to dotnet openapi tool #41928
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks
  • Add SignalR client results to Java client #41774
    area-signalr, signalr-client-java
  • (Corrected) Generate Full Composite Images of .NET and ASP.NET Bundled Together #41855
    area-infrastructure
  • Use GetFolderPath(UserProfile) to obtain HOME dir #41865
    area-dataprotection, area-runtime, community-contribution
  • catch JS exceptions during createJSCallResult and throw them in .NET #41916
    area-blazor, community-contribution
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `8d51dc5` to `9d21db9` #41926
    area-infrastructure
  • Backport 41868 to release/6.0 #41870
    Servicing-approved, area-blazor, 6.0.x
